name: Chicken Taco Stew
recipeIngredient: 1 (16 oz) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
1 (16 oz) can black beans, drained and rinsed
3 (10 oz) cans of diced tomatoes with green chillies
3 chicken breasts, cut lengthwise in half

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything together in a slow cooker except chicken. Lay chicken on top and cover. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4 hours.
30 minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred. Return shredded chicken to slow cooker and stir in. Serve with sour cream and avocado.
